examples.title: High Risk Example
examples.prompt: Write about the thing that happened recently. Everyone knows it was important and they all agree that this changed everything. Many people think it will definitely affect the future.

examples.title: Medium Risk Example
examples.prompt: Analyze the performance of several companies in the tech sector. Most of them showed growth patterns that clearly indicate market trends.

examples.title: Low Risk Example
examples.prompt: Generate a summary of Apple Inc.'s Q3 2024 financial results, focusing on iPhone sales figures and revenue growth compared to Q3 2023.

examples.title: Test Case - Ambiguity
examples.prompt: It seems like they are working on this project, but that approach might not work for them.
